text: Richard Michael Epcar (born April 29, 1955) is an American voice actor. He is the voice of Raiden in Mortal Kombat, of The Joker in Injustice and of Ansem in Kingdom Hearts. He was also the voice of Brick Bully in Mighty Morphin Alien Rangers. ==Other websites== * Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Denver Category:Actors who played the Joker Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American video game actors Category:American voice actors Category:Writers from Denver
title: Richard Epcar
